title: Captain America: The First Avenger (2011) 1080p iTunes
description:
Captain America: The First Avenger (2011) 124 min

DESCRIPTION:
After being deemed unfit for military service, Steve Rogers volunteers for a top secret research project that turns him into Captain America, a superhero dedicated to defending America's ideals.

SPECS IN BRIEF:
M4V file for iTunes/iDevices
V: 1920x816 23.98 fps h.264 @ 4600 Kbps
A: 160 Kbps 2.0 AAC & 384 Kbps 5.1 AC-3
S: English & English SDH / Subs for Norwegian dialogue burned-in
C: Yes (Numbered)

SOURCE:
Retail Blu-ray Disc

PLAYBACK:
Encoded & tagged for iTunes and Apple devices that can handle *1080p HD* video. Playback is confirmed for:
  1. 2012 iPad
  2. 2012 AppleTV
  3. 2011 iPad 2 (with 5.1 software or later)
  4. 2011 iPhone 4S
  5. 2010 AppleTV (with 5.0 software; will output file as 720p)
  6. Mixed reports for 2010 iPad 1 (with 5.1 software or later)
